code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{v4 as uuid}from'uuid';var spriteSlice=createSlice({name:'sprite',initialState:{sprites:[{spriteId:1,actions:[]}]},reducers:{addStripe:function addStripe(state,action){state.sprites.push({spriteId:action.payload.unique_id,actions:[]});},addActionInSprite:function addActionInSprite(state,action){var unique_id=uuid().slice(0,8);var newAction={title:"".concat(action.payload.title),action:action.payload.menuTitle,menuColor:action.payload.menuColor,blockId:action.payload.id,id:unique_id};var index=state.sprites.findIndex(function(_ref){var spriteId=_ref.spriteId;return spriteId===action.payload.selectedSpriteId;});state.sprites[index].actions.splice(action.payload.destinationId,0,newAction);},removeActionfromSprite:function removeActionfromSprite(state,action){var index=state.sprites.findIndex(function(_ref2){var spriteId=_ref2.spriteId;return spriteId===action.payload.selectedSpriteId;});state.sprites[index].actions.splice(action.payload.sourceId,1);}}});export var spriteActions=spriteSlice.actions;export default spriteSlice;
